DisableMetrics.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry metrics are enabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

Endpoint.description: Gets or sets a 'System.Uri' referencing the OpenAI REST API endpoint. Leave empty to connect to OpenAI, or set it to use a service using an API compatible with OpenAI.

Key.description: Gets or sets a the API key to used to authenticate with the service..

OpenAI.description: The settings relevant to accessing OpenAI.
